author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Perform the MERGE/DELETE on a commit.
(We can now commit without any directory alterations; we don't send the log
(handle_status_xml_parser): Declare new helper that returns the status
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/merge.c: New file to parse the MERGE response.
(close_edit): Create the MERGE and DELETE requests.
(handle_status_xml_parser): New function returns the status and feeds expat.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Correct pool usage for update report case to avoid sending gibberish.
(set_path): Allocate the revision and file name from the report's pool as
the pool passed to set_path is long-gone by the time we deliver.
(svn_ra_serf__do_update): Store the pool passed to do_update.

author: blair
msg: Forgot that I already added the test_svnmerge.py file from Giovanni
Bajo's repository, I just renamed it to svnmerge_test.py.  However,
the new test_svnmerge.py did have some changes, so copy its contents
into svnmerge_test.py and then delete it.

author: julianfoad
msg: Extend -c/--change option in diff and merge to accept negative revisions
as meaning the reverse of a change, making it possible to back out changes
with -c rather than -r.  E.g., -c -1234 is the same as -r1234:1233.
(main): Handle parsing for negative revision number.
(diff_only_property_change): Add checks for '-c' with negative and
Add an argument to indicate whether to use '-r' or '-c'.

author: malcolm
msg: Fix diff_tests 34 (repos->WORKING diffs on added, locally-modified
(delete_entry): Add all entries to the parent directory's 'compared'
